Underbart program.

Efter jag extraherat alla filer med CDMage och kör Reason.exe får jag upp "Insert Orkester"-meddelande. Jag har ju både Orkester-filen och Soundbank-filen i samma mapp som Reason... Nån som vet hur jag fixar detta?

Eh... Noen som har problemer med install av første cue/bin? Mounter den i D-Tools, men får feilmelding: "Failed to install Reason! Please contact technical  support." Noen som vet hva det skyldes?. Bruker Daemon v. 3.47.

Frustrating......

Transparance, serial finns i INFO-filen.

Cytostatika, mounta både Orkester och Soundbank i 2 enskilda enheter...ungefär som om du skulle ha 2 CD-rom. Det funkade så för mig i Reason 2.5 iaf. Testa!

når den spør om orkester, mounter du bare den bin filen.
og når den spør om factory soundbank cd`n, bare mounter du den.
jeg bruker alcohol 120%  funker helt gull.

Skal unngå de altfor dumme spørsmålene her...tror jeg hvertfall...

Jeg er ingen expert på  torrent programmer o.l, men for meg så virker det som at jeg har fått tak i den absolutt tregeste...jeg laster ned R3 via Shareaza...er det en dårlig deal? Den pusher knapt 5kb/sek...men andre ting jeg laster ned drar bra unna. Har prøvd andre torrent programmer, men det var ikke rare forskjellen. Noen tanker om det folkens?

All hjelp blir satt pris på...begynner å bli gal her...er gira på R3...

Thanks again!

Works great! 

Just open all of the files in Alcohol 120% and then click on file 'a' (Program) and then follow installation and load file 'b' (Orkester) and file 'c' (Soundbank) when they are requested.

Will definitely get Propellerhead back for the 'scholarship' software after I 'graduate' and start making some money!!

Propellerhead rules!!
Varför laddar det så långsamt?? Ligger ju på noll hela tiden. Ändå är det ju 72 seeders.  finns något bättre sätt att ladda reason?

I just have one question left...How come Shareaza sucks at this very thing? The torrent "system". It's as unpredictable as my last ex...I've been trying to download this for close to 2 weeks and it has been going up and down (mostly down) One day I had an average of about 15-20kb/s, but all in all I would say an average of about 2kb/s...that's slow...and now as I'm approaching the runway (complete download) it's barely moving at all...I've got 167mb's left until I'm in heaven's sweet bliss with R3 by my side...but at this rate I'll probably be at the pearly gates all alone, cause I fear for the end of my natural life before I get the enjoyment of using this R3...It ain't my line that's slowing it down cause everything else is lightning fast, as long as it's not R3...anyone? any suggestions?
It's deeply appreciated folks
PLz seed!=)

Fantastic. It is a bit worrying when you spend 3 days downloading it and there are just 3 unrecognised files in a folder, but all you have to do is download Daemon Tools (which is only a couple of MB, I got it from Pirate Bay) and Robert's your father's brother (Bob's your uncle, idiots...). Daemon Tools makes your dumb computer think it has the Reason CD in the disk drive, so that you don't have to have it :D

Just some information for MAC users, CD1 is MULTY tracked.

(not supported by the most mounting tools like Alcohol100% or deamon tools)

The CD1 .bin have a size of 700MB, select all files after you mount it as a virtual Cdrom, and there is only 273MB ;)
